mapper.insert: INSERT INTO COVER (MEM_ID, MEM_PW, MEM_NAME, MEM_EMAIL ,MEM_PHONE) VALUES (#{memId}, #{memPw}, #{memName}, #{memEmail}, #{memPhone})
mapper.select: SELECT COV_NO covNo, COV_TITLE covTitle, COV_LCONTENT covLcontent, COV_RCONTENT covRcontent, COV_IMG covImg FROM COVER ORDER BY COV_NO DESC
SELECT COV_NO covNo, COV_TITLE covTitle, COV_LCONTENT covLcontent, COV_RCONTENT covRcontent, COV_IMG covImg FROM COVER WHERE COV_NO = #{ covNo }
mapper.update: UPDATE COVER SET COV_TITLE = #{covTitle}, COV_LCONTENT = #{covLcontent}, COV_RCONTENT = #{covRcontent}, COV_IMG = #{covImg} WHERE COV_NO = #{covNo}
